column1: Weerasuriya J.  citing  Bindra1s  Interpretation  of Statutesl  8th  Edition  1997  p.582  said

column2: construction  between a law dealing  with  substantive rights  which  are already
enactments  should  be  construed  liberally  in  such  manner  as
enforcement of substantive rights effective and that rules of procedure are not
by themselves an end but the means to achieve the ends of justice. II
